alert.note: Alert for Adams; Franklin; Kearney; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 18 at 6:01PM CDT until April 18 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Franklin County in south central Nebraska... Northern Webster County in south central Nebraska... Southwestern Adams County in south central Nebraska... Southeastern Kearney County in south central Nebraska... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 601 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Franklin, or 31 miles northeast of Phillipsburg, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Riverton around 610 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Campbell, Bladen, Blue Hill and Holstein. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
